summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of portions of Blocks 6, 11 and 12, Porterfield's Addition, and a portion of Blocks 35 and 39, Woodland Addition to Salmon Bay City, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-152 and 17-110, respectively.
